snippet: Sony announces pricing plans for its PlayStation Vita on AT&T. The device is to arrive in American stores on Feb. 22.
abstract: Sony announces pricing plans for its PlayStation Vita on AT&T. The device is to arrive in American stores on Feb. 22.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - When Sony's new portable device, the PlayStation Vita, arrives in American stores on Feb. 22, customers will have the option to buy two data plans from AT&T to play games online anywhere they are.
